website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel marshmallow roasting sticks with a versatile length. You only get 4, but the price is reasonable.
pros: Telescopic handles can extend to almost 34 inches, a practical length for most users
Soft, insulated handles are easy to hold onto
Stainless steel construction is easy to clean
cons: A bit flimsier than some other models we considered, so they aren't ideal for roasting heavier foods

customer_reviews.title: A s’mores best friend, well the marshmallow  may think differently in the fire lol
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm for s’mores both camping and in my backyard. I can see what people are talking about if fully extended that they can be a lil flimsy (Hence the 4 stars vs 5) but you really don’t need to because they are fairly long. Not an issue with marshmallows regardless. If cooking hotdogs or sausages, even plant based like mine, I wouldn’t extend it all the way since they are obviously heavier than marshmallows. They are also easy to clean both in the sink and good ol fashion sand wash with a quick rinse or wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Hilarity_ensued72

customer_reviews.title: Love how compact they are
customer_reviews.text: We have not been able to use these for roasting marshmallows yet due to fire bans at the campsite. However, they tuck PERFECTLY into my camping bin and are nice and compact. They feel sturdy I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half of them bent/snapped first use!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these so much. When I pulled them out of the bag and extended them I was extremely impressed. Right out of the gates, the 4th one extended right out of the handle. The other 3 seemed fine- I assumed it was a lemon. Then, when my toddler was roasting his marshmallow it completely BENT! All other reviews for this were pretty outstanding, so I ordered a replacement and can update if anything is better.
customer_reviews.author: jaydeemill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, cheap carry case
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how these would be but really liked the idea that they are compact. What a pleasant surprise! Nicely made, work great! The carry case is a bit flimsy but the actual product itself is great! We have used them and they work perfectly. I'm going to sew a better case for them myself. That is my only critical point, the carry pouch is a bit cheap but it will suffice. Just make sure you don't lose the red plastic tip covers. The tips are sharp and if you lose the covers, the tips could poke right through your carry case.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Kid Friendly, Easy to Use Marshmallow Roasting Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part of the product is the telescoping feature. They are very compact and fit in a very small/narrow drawer in the kitchen of our vacation home with ease! They are also light weight/easy for the kids to use. Perfect for roasting marshmallows! Not ideal for hot dogs but manageable/not impossible. They angle outward slightly so the hotdogs arch as you slide them downward onto the prongs. A couple hotdogs were lost in the fire from slipping off as the kids tend to angle the sticks downwards into the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: High quality and makes roasting marshmallows a treat!
customer_reviews.text: These sure beat any stick or skewer you may have for roasting marshmallows! You can roast more than one at a time. My 4 year old can use them too with no issue. They are lightweight and the fact that they telescope in and out makes storage a breeze. They cleaned up very easy. And these were half the price of the ones sold at my local big box bed bath store.
customer_reviews.author: Megkat10

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable for easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: The tips are a little larger than I expected. Hang on to those plastic bits if you can to prevent getting poked. I have not complaint but I could suggest an improvement. #1, some type of guard to protect your hand from the heat of the fire. Like you see on those fencing swords. They could be longer. The tip of the forks could be half the size, they seem a little large for marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: MAGenre

customer_reviews.title: Great little roasting forks!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in quickly and were put to use just as fast. They telescope out to keep you safe from the heat of the fire. They don't sag when you put two hot dogs on them which impressed me and after using them for marshmallows they cleaned up easily. When you're done using them they collapse down to a size that's easy to store away and come with a little storage bag as well and plastic tips to cover then tines points. Not sure how long the tip covers will last but I truly like the product!
customer_reviews.author: NEA Sound

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smores!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are perfect for making Smores! I love the telescoping feature so that you can make it longer and not have to be too close to the fire. My kids had so much fun making smores with these! The cloth case is really nice to keep them all together and pack for a camping trip if necessary. I first ordered a set of these to include in a fire pit themed gift basket. I thought they were so cool I ordered a set for my family! So far I've only used them for Smores but they would also be great for hotdogs or any other food you can roast on a fire!
customer_reviews.author: TwinsMom

customer_reviews.title: Handle came off on the second time
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 2 of them. I know that the telescoping mechanism is not going to be super good so I was very careful with them. On one of them the handle just came off be the second time of using. Disappointed since they were not that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzelle

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest for marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: The classic problem with roasting a marshmallow is when it gets hot it loosens from the roasting stick and spins when you try and turn it over to roast the other side. These prongs are too far apart to put two tines through a marshmallow so you might aw well use a wire coat hanger. Appears they would work for a hot dog though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice distance to them to keep out of the heat
customer_reviews.text: I love these. We do a lot of campfires and end up doing the hot dog - s'mores thing. An elderly neighbor would always bring his self-made sticks to use (like a long mini fork). He recently passed and I went to his estate sale specifically looking for his BBQ sticks last month. Nada, so thougth I would try these. Did I say I absolutely love them, and got a use in last week in 70s weather, now its snowing. They are already cleaned and the wife has stored in the back of her car for use in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool, some problems....
customer_reviews.text: I found that the roasting sticks useful. They supported the weight of hotdogs pretty well. Good distance from fire, (telescoping). I found them difficult to clean after use. One of the forks in the set broke after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mellow Stick
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! I like how it extends so that if the fire is bigger you can create the right length for distance. It allows you to roast 2 marshmallows at a time - very efficient for the hungry campers!! It’s also easy to clean and easy to store them all together in the pouch it comes with. I’ve even used this at home recently. When we had left overs from camping my niece and I decided to make s’mores right here in the kitchen! Very good tool for camping!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley1202

customer_reviews.title: Sharp! Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty handy. I like how they collapse, but, be careful of the tips they're pretty sharp. Although the design of the tip was actually really helpful for marshmallows it kept them from spinning around the sharft because of the flattened end. Made it easy to get a even caramelized marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight and easy to clean. The length of them are great for letting kids roast their own marshmallows. I was even able to use them for hotdogs. One bent a little bit but I suppose that’s my own fault for using them for something other than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: michelle smith

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product in mail today. Seems like it they will work nicely. Unfortunately the protective foam on one of the handles was split and coming off. I would return and ask for a new set, but unfortunately we needed them for this coming weekend so we will make do.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We brought these camping and they were great! They don't take up a lot of room, but telescope out far enough to not get burned. I like the carrying bag and the caps to put on the sharp ends. We used for marshmallows, but could be used for a lot more. It's nice the prongs are far enough apart to put two things on and the won't touch (especially like for marshmallows).
customer_reviews.author: meemo

customer_reviews.title: Seem nice enough
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up on prime day with the hopes of using them for camping this year. I like that there's only 4. I'm only one person and don't need 6-8 roasting sticks. I love that they come with a storage bag. They telescope in and out smoothly. Like someone else mentioned, the welding between the pole and the 'fork' doesn't seem great. So durability might be an issue but for $11 I'm happy with my purchase. If you're looking for a smaller set of sticks, I'd give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: howdy2uTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used these for the first time on our week-long camping trip. They worked great! The kids loved the fact that they could roast two marshmallows at the same time. This is also great for hot dogs, cinnamon rolls, or just about anything else you can cook over an open fire. Once they are completely pulled out, they are very sturdy and you don't have to worry about them bending at all. They come in a nice little bag for storage in between uses. They also have little rubber caps that fit over the points so no one gets stuck. I would say these are pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun roasting tool, but a little flimsy when fully extended
customer_reviews.text: We used these at my son's birthday party and one of the sticks bent when fully extended. They were used by adults and with adult supervision when used by children, and they were being used correctly. The end bend like an antenna on an old radio. Would love to replace the single stick if possible. My son was delighted to get to use these, and they are nice to use without getting too near the fire. Overall a good product!
customer_reviews.author: jwm619

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. We have a fire pit and my son is at the point he's into sitting outside with us while we have the fire going. He's also discovered the loved for smores since going on fall hayrides at our local orchard. So this is perfect for us. I love the fact it comes with the red tip covers. The ends are on the sharper side and this helps protect them and you while not in use. It also comes in a nice bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, several of these broke. The handles just snap off. Don't waste your money. Find a pair with a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: DON’T LIGHT A FIRE WITHOUT THEM!
customer_reviews.text: What a well made product! I liked the first set of four (4) so much, I bought 4 more sets to give as gifts. They come with point protectors (trust me , those are nice to have as they are on the sharp side) and a little carry case; very nice!
customer_reviews.author: BAMAPAT

customer_reviews.title: A Smore's necessity!!
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for our camping trip. Light and easy to pack away, didn't have to force the skewers back into the bag like puzzle pieces. Super easy to clean just by wiping it with a paper towel and extended a really good distance. Holding it over the flames didn't discolor it or change the temperature in the handle. The tips are pointy but not a total loss if you were to lose the red tip protectors. The only thing this item is missing is a free package of marshmallow's, graham crackers, and kit-kat's to seal the deal!! I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Edlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I love roasting marshmallows so I bought this set since it’s sometimes a hassle to find sticks to use. The are wonderful! Well made and very sturdy. They each can hold two items. Just remember to take of the plastic tips on the end before using! Lol. Love how long they are. They come with a cute drawstring bag for storage. Can’t wait for my grandchildren to try them out too!
customer_reviews.author: tndreamer

customer_reviews.title: easy to store
customer_reviews.text: these are retractable and will actually fit in a drawer or inside a cupboard shelf....not like the long, pointy, dangerous ones that you have to stand up in the corner of the garage or somewhere. These will always be clean, safe and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Zinfen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact but long enough for young children to toast hot dogs and marshmellows
customer_reviews.text: This was a great item in my opinion. The sticks collapse and fit in a small bag (provided) The points all came with removable and reinsertable plastic caps that can be kept in the bag when not being used. It beats the long rigid tines we grew up with and they were fairly easy to clean of baked marshmallow goo. The price was right and I am sure we will use them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for good roasting sticks for marshmallows for my kids to make s'mores and these are great for that. We made a bonfire last night and finally got to use them and my kids love them. The handles make it easy to hold and I just love how you can adjust the size of how long you want the stick. It comes in a small bag to put them in once you're done which is helpful so you don't lose them.
customer_reviews.author: CCastro

customer_reviews.title: Love they are compact
customer_reviews.text: Great size, love that they are compact for travel and have caps that you can put back on them when not in use. Great for camping or backyard fire for marshmallows or hotdogs. Carry case so you can keep them together when needed to pack in vehicle to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy telescoping marshmallow sticks that make campfires more fun. They are long enough to keep hands away from the fire and sturdy enough to hold hotdogs or other, heavier items without bending. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Berry

customer_reviews.title: No more dirty sticks or burned fingers
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't review this product. Bought for my son-in-law and they won't be used until summertime. They look and feel very sturdy but lightweight. I'm sure he and my daughter and their friends will have lots of fun using them.
customer_reviews.author: kcsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, but the sturdiness is disappointing. They don’t stay strait when you’re trying to roast marshmallows or hot dogs if they’re dully extended. They also feel kind of flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Tarron

customer_reviews.title: Smores Time!
customer_reviews.text: We just built a fire pit in back yard, just beautiful and ordered these marshmallow roasting sticks. They are made well and will be perfect for roasting marshmallows or hotdogs! It has two prongs at the end, like a fork with plenty of space to put two marshmallows. I just can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The telescoping is genius!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with these. I usually look for sticks to toast marshmallows on when we go camping but the last time the good sticks were far a few between. Figured it was time to invest in an easier option. The telescoping feature on these makes them so convenient and easy to pack! They are also strong enough to put hot dogs ons. Can’t wait to experiment with roasting other things as well
customer_reviews.author: LaurieZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect for storing in smaller places- worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and lost them. I just re-bought them because I do really like them. They're easy to use and I appreciate the fact that they extend or can collapse. Makes it easier depending on if i'm using them in the house with our wood burner or outside at the bonfire pit. I haven't had any issues and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: apbassett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for our tent camping travels! My husband and I With our three kids under the age of 6 went on a 2 week roadtrip across the Midwest and south, tent camping along the way—not a lot of room to spare in the van so these were absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 skewers fell apart first time using them. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are perfect! I especially love that they are stainless, so no rusting, and they seem sturdy enough to even do the XL marshmallows. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: One stick arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These definitely served their purpose. I was impressed both with how long they extended (a couple inches longer than many competitors) and how cool the metal stayed during use. However, the comfy grip on one stick came split (before use). Being the teacher that I am, that’s a 75%, hence the 3 stars. I am concerned with how the grip will deteriorate after washings. I’m thinking we’ll be down to 3 sticks before long.
customer_reviews.author: megan p childers

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our house was on the market and we received an offer from the cutest family. Their children were most excited about the fire pit we had in the back yard. So after closing, I left a gift basket on the counter with marshmallows, chocolate, graham crackers, and these roasting sticks. It was a fun gift to put together and even more fun to see them open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Thought they might be a one or two time use, but I was pleasantly surprised to fine we are using them almost nightly. The quality is very good and they are easy to clean. Much better that wooden sticks for our S'mores. Would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: 4 Star pending an actual test. These guys are emailing requesting a review, but I have not had the chance to use them yet. I can say that they appear exactly as pictured. I was hoping they would be a bit longer as these will be used more in a bonfire than a smaller campfire. There is not much more to say until I test them. I will update the review once we actually use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ironhead

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to my camping gear.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to my camping gear. I love that the handle extends and collapses. The biggest challenge for all of the others is that they are unwieldy. They're too big for totes. These also came with tips to cover the ends, which I loved. And the ends are not just a pointy stick. They're like a flat triangle. We used them this weekend. Tough to get a marshmallow on it, but they stayed better. Probably work much better for hot dogs than your typical skewer. Very halpy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Crook

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use - CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sticks for my kids for Christmas, but never had an opportunity to until this past weekend when 2 or the 4 broke while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Acfisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Camper!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They seem to be very sturdy and well made! I honestly was expecting something cheap that would break easily however these exceeded my expectations! They will be perfect for camping with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: nice but joints spin easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy, but for me seems like they are not as sturdy as I hoped. The tines turn easily and even rotate with hot dog weight
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harris

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and compact. But I don't like that the arms are rusty. Seems they should be shinny and new. Maybe the company needs to check there storage for these. If I had so much time in my day to send things back that were poorly put together in the first place. I would send it back but I don't have that kind of time in my day. I guess I just expect a product to be good when I get it not used to looking form
customer_reviews.author: ddee

customer_reviews.title: Great portable roasting sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Nice marshmallow/ weiner roasting sticks. Easily carry in the pouch anywhere with the telescopic handles! Fits in your back pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are a gift therefore I have not used them myself. However, they appear to be very sturdy. I like the fact that they telescope making usage safer and storage easier. Insulated handles and protective caps on the tongs are certainly an important safety feature. I also like the fact that a carrying bag is included.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, quality material
customer_reviews.text: The camping gear is light weight, comes with a nice bag, and seems to be good quality. I camp a lot so we'll see about longevity on the stakes and how they hold up. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Reed

customer_reviews.title: MADE FOR MARSHMALLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Set of four marshmallow / hotdog forks that telescope out for long reaches over campfires without singing fingers! Beats trying to find a long-enough twig and wondering whether it's toxic or safe to use! These are well made, sturdy, durable. All four can be "un-telescoped" and fit in a small pouch which help keep them all together and can be stuffed in a tiny space in a packed camping vehicle. Definitely LOVE this product and plan to buy another set so I'll have plenty for our neighborhood bonfire nights!t!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: All the bells and whistles but at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet but I can’t wait! They are everything I hoped they would be...durable, not flimsy at all. They will do 2-4 marshmallows and hotdogs even better with the double prongs, no spinning hotdogs! Love the plastic covers for the sharp points...gonna keep those for storing. Plus a bag holds them when not in use. I chose the cheaper ones and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: My family used these for roasting marshmallows. No problems at all. Used 3 different times so far. Very easy to clean. No rush at all. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Smart one

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the wide prongs!!! More stylish than most camp sticks too. And the carrying case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: GARY

customer_reviews.title: a little flimsy when fully extended
customer_reviews.text: they look and feel nice but they are a little too flimsy when they are fully extended and do not inspire confidence when you are dealing with kids and fire.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to use, I just would prefer that they were longer, you have to hold them close to the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that the extensions would be loose and slide back and forth easily. But they are tight and didn't have any issues. The only issue and it has nothing to do with the product, is that I didn't think how hot metal would be versus wood skewers. So you need to be careful when making smores with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Trenouth

customer_reviews.title: Strong roasting stick and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these because we wanted roasting sticks strong enough to cook bratwurst. These are heavy duty! We have used them several times for brats and marshmallows and we are very happy with the quality. On first use, one of the roasting sticks separated from the handle. I messaged the seller and they responded within a few hours and sent a replacement immediately. Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The telescoping feature is key
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So far they've been great for marshmallows over the fire pit. We intend to try them with hot dogs, as well. I think the telescoping feature is important.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Blush ~ tenor virtuoso

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing
customer_reviews.text: I've just received these and am very happy with them. I had something similar already from another vendor, but there were much flimsier. These are reasonably sturdy. With the telescopic part, you can only get them so strong, but these seem to do the job. My only minor issue is the forks themselves are much thicker than I would like and are harder to use with marshmallows, which is all we use them for. But for the hot dog crowd I'm sure this is a better solution. Nice tip protectors & bag also. A recommend buy!
customer_reviews.author: m2505

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We recieved this product quickly and tried it out right away. We love it!!! Its cool how it has the little red protective covers for the pronges that hold the marshmallows. Super easy to clean. Also they retract far so good for little ones by the fire. We love this product! 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: ok it is a nice games but it needs more

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a reasonably priced unique gift for your camping and outdoor friends. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: Love the telescopic feature of these and the bag they can be stored in. Very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Aquapod Bottle Launcher

customer_reviews.title: These are so fun! They come in a nice little carrying pouch ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! They come in a nice little carrying pouch so they’re easy to throw in your bag. They are pretty short when they come but when you pull them all they way out they will keep you safely away from the flames while cooking. They’re compact and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: MeganReis13

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: these are nice, but as with anything- burned marshmallow does not like to come off!!
customer_reviews.author: Derrek

customer_reviews.title: Great product well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Good quality well made and good price very happy with this Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jilken

customer_reviews.title: Good product with well made storage bag included
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun around the camp fire These extendable forks are long enough to reach the camp fire with ease We cleaned them after a weekend away camping and packed them in there included carry bag Love them
customer_reviews.author: Tactical Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Used them for the first time last night and they are great. I love that they shrink down because it makes them easy to store and then the extend to the perfect length for roasting. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: EBayer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the RV that has limited space. I can actually fit them in the silverware drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the telescoping feature.  Easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable roasting stick option. The telescoping feature us what sold me. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks were just exactly what we were needing. Perfect length for roasting marshmallows! Kid's even used them for their hot dogs and they held up just fine without any bending.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last minute for a camping trip and they were great! The carrying case is good quality and each fork comes with plastic nubs to put on the ends to prevent accidental stabbing. These worked great for marshmallows and the sausages we brought along. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: They’re as close to perfect as it gets
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are quite small and yet expand to a length that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Couch

customer_reviews.title: too easily bent. In fact one was bent already
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest roasting sticks; too easily bent. In fact one was bent already. Not sure that they will make it through the season, but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. It does the job. Hard to clean and it is edges a bit sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Anelo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality telescopic sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice looking, good insulating handle. The bag stitching on the top fell apart after opening it 3 times, but that's easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Lorella Marazita

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great my third purchase we have marshmallow roast a lot they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Becky M.

customer_reviews.title: Roasting tool
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons loved using the roasting sticks. They didn't have to worry about getting to close to the fire to get their marshmallows toasted. They didn't want to stop. Very happy how easy they were to lengthen. I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Amie Lemay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These forks are super convenient and light, the travel bag is great and takes up so little space when packed. Also love that they have the little rubber guards to keep them from being too pokey when not in use - great feature for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kaj

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit on Christmas day! My family enjoyed roasting marshmallows and eating smores. Everyone commented on how nice the roasting sticks were. We are definitely happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Easy for traveling and packing
customer_reviews.text: These were very popular on our camping trip. Everyone loved that they were collapsing sticks.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SAFE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to use over an open fire and the telescopic feature and storage bag makes them so much more easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping and stored easily in a small space.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: They arrived promptly and though I haven't had a chance to use them yet, they look very sturdy and durable. I also like the bag they come with to store.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are lightweight and safe for my littles to use.

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient though
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. Kind of flimsy when fully extended. Super convenient though, and nice and easy to have on a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: from Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Bag arrived with a ~1-inch rip
customer_reviews.text: Forks look okay, but haven't been used yet. The bag arrived with a ~1-inch rip, which would be fine except I bought this set for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: sadiebleu

customer_reviews.title: Successful Campfire Cooking!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like is, the product was made very well, extended to a safe length and was a quality utensil. It enhanced our Camping Experience. I ordered a second set for my daughter and granddaughter. She’s learning the fine art of roasting marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great open fire roasting skewers!
customer_reviews.text: We recently built a fire pit at home. My teenage daughters like making s’mores when the mood strikes. I don’t like having long skewers that I have to figure a storage place when not in use ..... These are great! They store in a small pouch, clean easily and are well made!
customer_reviews.author: George H. Livermore

customer_reviews.title: A campers best friend
customer_reviews.text: These things are so strong and easy to clean but I love that they retract which makes them easy to store!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. We use these all the time now
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. We use these all the time now. They are very safe for out door fires and the carry pouch makes it easy to store them away anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like to take these with us camping. They are long enough to keep you at a good distance from the fire. I love that I can pack them in the tote with the rest of out camping supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheasy, not very well built, havent used yet but they will not last very long! Friend gave me a cheap telescoping back scratcher a few years ago, same build with a different end/purpose! For some reason it wont let me submit a sub par review!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!!!
customer_reviews.text: My camping friends are all jealous of these!!! They are perfect. They fold up nice and easy for cleaning in the sink and storing. Also they are light weight for the kids to hold on too. The bigger heavy ones kids can't roast their own stuff. The kiddos love these.

customer_reviews.text: These hopefully will be great camping, will give another review once we actually test them out. They appear to be sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Nice and sturdy, I love how they fold into a nice small roasting stick for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: natalie bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are pretty awesome. They have multiple uses and are excellent for camping. I like that they are compact so they don’t take up a lot of room and then they expand when you use them. Great for hotdogs and marshmallows, they are good for all ages. The plastic tips make them easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Tapirus Marshmallow Roasting Sticks – Set of 4 Telescoping Campfire Sticks - Protect Kids with Insulated Handle Holders – Extendable, Retractable and Collapsing – Heavy Duty Metal Camping Equipment
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE CAMPING ROASTING STICK SET: Are you a huge fan of camping in the woods or BBQ at the backyard? If so, then the wonderfully crafted Tapirus large telescopic bonfire stick set of 4 is the way to go. Roasting delicacies, vegetables and meat fireside has never been that easy and fast! Invest on this kitchen must utensil addition and cherish moments of camping fun and relaxation with your beloved ones!

DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL HOT DOG STICKS: Forget all about poorly camping equipment metal sticks that would easily corrode and bend and trust your food on our durable stainless steel sticks. Made from high quality stainless steel you may rest assured that they are completely rust proof and corrosion resistant for the many outdoor grilling explorations have yet to come! Their double prongs will put an end to rotating marshmallows nightmare right away!

ERGONOMIC EXTENDABLE TELESCOPIC DESIGN: Do not compromise with anything less than perfection when it comes to campfire forks and roasting your favorite food. Our BBQ skewers have an ergonomic design that will facilitate the holding and using of the sticks to the fullest. Hold one in your hands today and feel the difference for yourself. They can be extended to 33.9" (86cm) and retracted to 9.4" (23.8cm), so you can use them as it works best for you or your kids!

INSULATED EASY TO GRIP HANDLES WITH SAFETY CAPS: Upon designing these s’mores skewers we tried to make them extremely convenient to use by everyone. Their soft PVC cushioned and insulated handles, will allow you to easily hold them with safety without burning your precious hands. Each fork comes with two mini red safety caps to avoid accidental poking while carrying them along. Place them nice and tidy in their cute black carrying bag and off you go!

MULTIPURPOSE CAMPING ROASTING STICKS: Our camping roasting sticks are ideal for all kinds of purposes and food adventures. Take them along at camping and beach excursions, hiking and trekking trips, lake fishing and mountain hunting, bonfire gatherings and BBQ fiestas. Use them to roast hot hogs, marshmallows, smores, meatballs, fish fillets, shrimps, vegetables, mushrooms and so many more. Pure perfection, right?
